title: Bribery LFT
body:
Mid laner looking for team.

19/SYD
Free after 6 almost everyday.
Strengths: Strong laner, understand matchups
Weaknesses: Priorities pressuring mid/farming over helping team in soloq, not a big champ pool
Experiences: Challenger soloq mid s5 season, challenger team, scrimmed with an opl team for a bit.
Champ pool: Lb, ori, zed, kass, jayce, vlad, kha,kat, ez, luc, all mid yes

Reply here or add me in game. 
serious teams only.
 --

replies.body: Bribery is a soloQ Hero. He isn't always the mid laner we need but the one we deserve. Bribery is not a legend nor a myth he is a player who plays the here and now, he might tell you to afk... he might tell you that you're a beast but you can always bet that bribery will save you lp in your time of need... it feels like just yesterday I was in my D2 Promos and Bribery was on my team. I saw him insta lock Zed, Zed being Briberys best champion i thought to my self 'easy game' Although Bribery went 3/5 you can bet HE NEVER GAVE UP and let me carry him to victory. Bribery is a legend who even in the hardest times will never give up and will keep believing... please someone take in this god amongst men... this future faker... ~~this miracle that ended up in oce~~ .. This miracle that was born to save our world... the world of league of legends...
Would you like to soloQ with me for a few games?
Hey. I sent you a request so if you're still looking for a team hit me up on league.
Add vicenza if interested for a trial
